Message.Title: Bearish Dark Cloud Cover
Message.Msg: This is a top reversal pattern with two candlesticks. A white candlestick appears on the first day while an uptrend is in progress. The second day opens at a new high, with a gap up and closes more than halfway into the prior white body, leading to the formation of a strong black candlestick. GLTA

Message.Title: New York's case against BofA, Merrill may be dropped,
Message.Msg: New York State's 2010 case against Bank of America over its acquisition of Merrill Lynch may be withdrawn, reports Reuters. The case appeared to hit trouble last month when a federal judge approved a $2.43B settlement in a shareholder class action against Bank of America over the Merrill Lynch deal. Because shareholders have settled, New York can no longer pursue damages on their behalf, legal experts say.

Message.Title: Bank Of America Reaches New Highs After Settling With MBIA
Message.Msg: Bank of America (BAC) finally agreed to settle its 5-year mortgage fight with MBIA (MBI). The settlement entitles the bond insurer, MBIA, to a payment of $1.6 billion from Bank of America. In addition, Bank of America will pay back its other debts to MBIA. It will also extend a $500 million credit line to MBIA. After the news came out regarding the settlement, MBI shares soared by a staggering 45%. The stock soared to $15.45 during intraday trading before it eventually settled down and closed at $14.29. It currently trades around $15.

Message.Title: AG Schneiderman losing against BAC.
Message.Msg: 8:39 AM NY AG Schneiderman may have to drop the state's case against Bank of America (BAC) over misleading investors during the Merrill Lynch acquisition after a judge last month approved a $2.43B class-action settlement for shareholders. "Once shareholders have made their peace, they can't take a 2nd bite of the apple through the AG," says a securities lawyer.

Message.Title: BAC and KeyBank purchases.
Message.Msg: KeyBank (NYSE:KEY): KeyBank has revealed that it purchased a CMBS portfolio belonging to Bank of America (NYSE:BAC), and acquiring Berkadia Commercial Mortgage’s special servicing business. The purchase will put KeyBank’s commercial servicing portfolio in the top three in the country, with a worth of about $205 billion.

Message.Title: Bernanke: More may be needed on too big to fail
Message.Msg: Bernanke: More may be needed on too big to fail Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke, in the question-and-answer session after his speech Friday, said it was important to end the "too big to fail" perception for large banks and said more action might be needed even after Dodd-Frank and Basel III rules are fully implemented. One item the Fed is considering is whether big firms need increased amount of senior debt, Bernanke said.

Message.Title: Paramedic from Texas plant blast arrested
Message.Msg: Paramedic from Texas plant blast arrested another sick puppy.... Doug Stanglin, USA TODAY1:48 p.m. EDT May 10, 2013 Officials are mum on whether the arrest is linked to the explosion that killed 14 last month. Suspect arrested on charges of possession of a destructive device A volunteer paramedic who was one of the first on the scene of a fire and massive explosion last month at a fertilizer plant in West, Texas, was arrested early Friday and charged with possession of a destructive device, The Dallas Morning News reported. Officials have not said whether the arrest of Bryce Reed, 31, is related to the April 17 explosion at the West Fertilizer Co. that killed 14 people, injured around 200 and destroyed hundreds of homes in the vicinity, the newspaper said. The arrest came as Texas law enforcement officials on Friday said they had launched a criminal investigation into the massive fertilizer plant explosion. News 92 FM in Houston reported that Reed, who is with the West Emergency Medical Services, was one of the early first responders to the scene of the catastrophe and was assigned to be the incident commander at the scene. News 92 FM said authorities indicated that the explosive device was a pipe bomb. U.S. Marshals arrested Reed around 2 a.m. and and booked him into McLennan County Jail in Waco, the News reported. The newspaper said Reed had spoken to The Dallas Morning News and the Los Angeles Times in the immediate aftermath of the explosion about his experience. In the interview with the Los Angeles Times on the day after the explosion, Reed said that his best friend, an emergency worker, had also responded to the fire that preceded the blast. Bryce Reed said he was ordered to go just south of the fire to take over as incident commander while his friend stayed at the scene of the blaze and was there when the explosion occurred. "He was my best friend. He got me help through the crisis in my life. He's my brother," Reed told the Times.

Topic.Title: 13 is the new floor

Message.Msg: It could easily drop a dollar per share between now and then. Look at wafh happened between Jan 4th and 22nd when BAC first closed above 12.00 at around 12.25, it dropped to 11.14 close before rebounding in Feb to close at a high 12.25 then dropped to 11.03 in less than 2 weeks. Then on to a high close of 12.78 and dropping yet again before arriving where we are now. Again as soon as you think you find a pattern it changes but I bet 30% of my shares on this pattern and sold today. This all happened with the March meeting ahaed for possible divedend increase and again ahead of the Q1. I bet it does similar metween now and end of May.

Message.Title: Speaking like Obama is fairly easy !
Message.Msg: I specialized in linguistic engineering and I noticed Obama only speaks 2 words at a time while raising his voice on the second word. Adolph Hitler did the same and he was really successful at it. It is called "duotone linguistic mesmerization" OK here's how you talk like Obama You know...(raise your voice on the word know) I think.....(raise your voice on the word think) I could (raise your voice on the word could) Kick your ash (raise your voice on the word ash) Anytime I want (raise your voice on the word want) Voila.....now look in the mirror....you have just made an Obama out of yourself !!!! CONGRATUALATIONSSSS !!!!!
